data.message: I wish there was a way to keep certain people from tagging you at all. It's either no one can or all friends can. I hate having to go though our pages deleting tags to things that aren't appropriate for our kids to see or those stupid event unwanted event pics/flyers

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Amy! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Sarah
Making it better? Really? Are you sure better is the word you are looking for?
